channel.title: coroutines on James Barr
channel.description: Recent content in coroutines on James Barr

item.title: AppDialer
item.description: Backstory On my phone, I have over 300 apps installed. The built in Launcher has some machine learning to try to show me an app it thinks I'll want to start, but really I need quick & easy access to all of my apps. Solution Enter AppDialer. I built this app using a couple of technoligies that I wanted to try out: namely Coroutines and Motif.
